product_name: Manduka PRO Black Sage Yoga Mat
long_description: The Manduka PRO Black Sage Yoga mat is known for its simple design, nonslip surface, thick cushioning and excellent durability. It will quickly become your favorite yoga mat! 0.25 in. thickness cushions your spine, hips, knees and elbows on hard surfaces. Slip-resistant fabriclike top surface does not get sticky, even when wet with perspiration. Dot pattern on the bottom keeps the mat from sliding on many different surfaces. The Pro Black Sage yoga mat is backed by a lifetime guarantee from Manduka.
short_description: The Manduka PRO Black Sage Yoga mat is known for its simple design, nonslip surface, thick cushioning and excellent durability. It will quickly become your favorite yoga mat!
